name: speed-motioner
description: A modern web-based fighting game training tool

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run kill-processes && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: echo 'Skipping build on Heroku - using pre-built files'
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.deploy:github: git add . && git commit -m "Auto-deploy: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')" && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:local && npm run deploy:github && npm run deploy:heroku
scripts.setup:heroku: heroku buildpacks:clear --app speed-motioner && heroku buildpacks:add heroku/nodejs --app speed-motioner

author: Speed Motioner Team
